com.franza.Academic.beans

Interface JavaBean

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DepartmentBeanLocal, DepartmentBeanRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DepartmentBean

    public interface JavaBean

    Interface that contains all the signatures for the generic CRUD operations further implemented in the correlated java bean classes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<TO> create(TO to)
      Signature of a method that delegates the data access object to generate a new instance in the database using an entity bean.
      java.util.List<TO> delete(TO to)
      Signature of a method that delegates the data access object to delete an instance present in the database using an entity bean.
      java.util.List<TO> read(TO to)
      Signature of a method that delegates the data access object to read a list of instances in the database using an entity bean as a search key.
      java.util.List<TO> update(TO to)
      Signature of a method that delegates the data access object to update an instance already present in the database using an entity bean.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        java.util.List<TO> create(TO to)
                   throws InvalidInputException

        Signature of a method that delegates the data access object to generate a new instance in the database using an entity bean.

        Parameters:
        to - : transfer object needed to encapsulate and transfer data from the application controller to the entity bean.
        Returns:
        the list of the result for the executed operation of creation: has to contain the inserted tuple.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - Exception thrown when one or more inputs given by the user are not valid. It is generated by the read function of this same class.

      • read

        java.util.List<TO> read(TO to)
                 throws InvalidInputException

        Signature of a method that delegates the data access object to read a list of instances in the database using an entity bean as a search key.

        Parameters:
        to - : transfer object needed to encapsulate and transfer data from the application controller to the entity bean.
        Returns:
        the list of the result for the executed operation of reading: has to contain all the tuples that satisfy the search key.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - Exception thrown when one or more inputs given by the user are not valid. It is generated by the operation that moves the data from the transfer object to the entity bean.

      • update

        java.util.List<TO> update(TO to)
                   throws InvalidInputException

        Signature of a method that delegates the data access object to update an instance already present in the database using an entity bean.

        Parameters:
        to - : transfer object needed to encapsulate and transfer data from the application controller to the entity bean.
        Returns:
        the list of the result for the executed operation of update: has to contain the updated tuple.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - Exception thrown when one or more inputs given by the user are not valid. It is generated by the read function of this same class.

      • delete

        java.util.List<TO> delete(TO to)
                   throws InvalidInputException

        Signature of a method that delegates the data access object to delete an instance present in the database using an entity bean.

        Parameters:
        to - : transfer object needed to encapsulate and transfer data from the application controller to the entity bean.
        Returns:
        the list of the result for the executed operation of deletion: has to contain no tuples.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - Exception thrown when one or more inputs given by the user are not valid. It is generated by the read function of this same class.
